Paul Engelen is a British makeup artist who has worked on dozens of major motion pictures. His credit list is lengthy, but some of the highlights include ''Empire of the Sun'','' Batman'','' Star Wars: The Phantom Menace'','' Gladiator'','' Troy'','' Kingdom of Heaven, Prince Caspian'', and ''Robin Hood''. Working as the makeup designer on ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]'' will mark one of the few times he has worked in television.

On 15 September 2012 he won a [[wikipedia:Creative Arts Emmy Award|Creative Arts Emmy Award]] for his work on the [[Season 2|second season]] of ''Game of Thrones''<ref>[http://www.westeros.org/GoT/News/Entry/Game_of_Thrones_Wins_Big_at_Creative_Arts_Emmys/ Westeros.org]</ref>.
